text: My friend, you've come just at the right time, my apprentice is just about to leave. What can I help you with?
What can you tell me about the the Thirteen?
What makes you think I know anything?
Seriously? I've known you for over 20 years and I know you have little birds everywhere chirping to you. Also, you never miss out on a shady deal in Algengur.
Okay, fine, you know me too well. Where do I start?
Let me tell you the reason for the sudden changes of The Order. It began 5 years ago. I'm sure you felt it too. A magical wave swept through Algengur.
The Thirteen aren't themselfs since then, like their whole being changed. I started investigating and found interesting things. Sinister things...
I've found the traces of Nouzur all across Vaett, which is not pleasing. It was no ordinary magic. I've found out it was a demon from The Maw, who caused it.
I've found a Realm Portal in the black dunes of Ermir's Vulcano. Azzinoth stood guard, but I managed annihilate him.
So that's where it came from. I've successfully found out the identity of the demon.
His name is Rirgrollath. The only tales I found where ancient tales about a General of the Demon Legions. I believe he is that general.
That complicates it. Nouzur is home to some unpleasant magic and if he is the one controlling the Order, than it will be harder to nullify than I expected.
I will have to personally make a visit to the Thirteens. I'll start with Gudleikur.
Take this, it's a Stone of Resurrection. In case things get... wild.
Thanks! I'll see you after I get things in order. Ég mun sjá thig!
